Posts.Content: Thank you. Yes, I am also contemplating that if I told her to see a therapist, she might be offended. I know that it is most effective if the person has to ask for help themselves because they are aware of their own problems and needs.
Posts.Title: Should I refer my friend to a Therapist?

Posts.Content: My friend was recently diagnosed with Stage 2 breast cancer. She has 4 children and her husband left them in this turbulent time. If I am in her situation right now, I would freak out. I am thinking of offering support by referring her to see a therapist. Would this be a good thing to do or will she be offended by this?
Posts.Title: Should I refer my friend to a Therapist?
